body_html: You would have to write your own estimator (eg. model fn where you will call the ops from lstm and gbdts). An example of something like this is https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/boosted_trees/estimator_batch/dnn_tree_combined_estimator.py - you can get an idea on how to do it out of it (eg using hooks etc)
body_text: You would have to write your own estimator (eg. model fn where you will call the ops from lstm and gbdts). An example of something like this is https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/boosted_trees/estimator_batch/dnn_tree_combined_estimator.py - you can get an idea on how to do it out of it (eg using hooks etc)
body: You would have to write your own estimator (eg. model fn where you will call the ops from lstm and gbdts). An example of something like this is https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/boosted_trees/estimator_batch/dnn_tree_combined_estimator.py - you can get an idea on how to do it out of it (eg using hooks etc)
